lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Desktop publishing is a relatively new market but industry analysts estimate that sales will reach one billion dlrs this year and jump to six billion dlrs by 1990, fueled by the rush of corporations to bring their printing and publishing needs in-house rather than to more expensive outside printers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Both users and makers of electronic publishing systems said the support of the world's largest computer maker was critical to the language's ultimate acceptance by users.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The advent of personal computers, laser printers and graphics software has allowed users to design and print brochures, newsletters and a host of other communications at their desks for a fraction of the cost of an outside printing firm.
